summary: Feature request to include decoded gRPC error details on all errors thrown from the Client API, not just specific high-level error classes. This would help users diagnose operational issues by providing access to server-provided error metadata, though it requires solving challenges around type checking, error serialization, and recursive protobuf decoding.
userImpact: Users will be able to access detailed error information from gRPC errors for better operational troubleshooting without waiting for specific error classes to be created.
proposedFix: Decode and attach detailed error messages to generic gRPC errors; solve instanceof limitations, JSON serialization of protobuf objects, and recursive protobuf decoding challenges
keyQuote: We should therefore always decode detailed error messages and make them available on the generic grpc errors, even if we don't make specific error classes
